casebody.data:
G.A., BY his parent and guardian L.A., Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
ST. MARY OF THE LAKES SCHOOL and the Catholic Diocese of Trenton, Defendants-Respondents. C-787 September Term 2017
080586 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 26, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000638-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
